testsuite.name: com.yhdc.batch_scheduler.batch.BatchJobTest

testcase.name: There are three customers who haven't logged in for over a year and 5 customers who has logged in within a year
There are 10 customers and are not for dormant state
The batch should be working even if there are no customers
If the batch is failed, FAILED should be returned.
